build.help: Compiles TypeScript, processes templates, and prepares your ContextJS project for deployment or local use.

restore.description: Install or update your project dependencies.
restore.help: Automatically restores and updates all dependencies for your ContextJS project, ensuring everything is ready to build and run.

run.help: Runs the main entry point specified in your ContextJS project file, starting your application.

watch.description: Watch for changes and rebuild automatically.
watch.help: Watches your project files for any changes and automatically rebuilds your ContextJS project in real time.
